abstract.t: Most network equipments feature telemetry as a mean to monitoring their status. Several protocols exist to this end; for example, the model-driven telemetry governed by YANG models. These protocols provide the data itself, without any contextual information about the collection method. This can render the data unusable if that context is lost, for instance when the data is stored without the relevent information. This draft proposes a YANG model to store that contextual information, that must be stored along with the collected data in order to keep the collected data exploitable.
